summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1874, for the improvement of 15th Avenue Northeast from East 75th Street to East 80th Street, and East 80th Street, from 15th Avenue Northeast to 18th Avenue Northeast, all in the City of Seattle by constructing wooden walks and crosswalks thereon, under Ordinance No. 19520 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
